resources.string: Take Note is a simple note-taking app designed for students.
In adding notes, press the \"Add Button\" on the lower right in the Note Screen.
It will then prompt an Input Dialog which you can input the Title and the Content of your note.
Pressing \"OK\" will add your note on screen displaying its title. Pressing \"CANCEL\" will cancel your operation.
In order for you to edit or delete your note, first, long press your selected note to show the options.
Selecting the \"Edit\" option will prompt you an Input Dialog similar to when adding notes. Pressing \"OK\" will edit your note. Pressing \"CANCEL\" will cancel your operation.
Selecting the \"Delete\" option will instantly delete your note. Deleted notes cannot be retrieved so proceed with caution.
In General settings, there are only two. The \"Dark Mode\" switch and \"Notifications\" switch.
Dark Mode will let you set the color of the Main Interface to darker color. Notifications by default are enabled and will be noticeable whenever your close the app during Login.
In Account settings, you can edit your User Profile. Leaving everything blank will cause no harm and is totally safe.
If you want to edit some of your details, you are capable to do so.
SETTINGS WILL ONLY BE APPLIED ONCE \"SAVE\"BUTTON IS CLICKED.
